dcmOverwritePolicy.title: Overwrite Policy
dcmOverwritePolicy.description: Overwrite Policy: NEVER, ALWAYS, SAME_SOURCE, SAME_SERIES or SAME_SOURCE_AND_SERIES. NEVER if absent.

dcmBulkDataSpoolDirectory.title: Bulk Data Spool Directory
dcmBulkDataSpoolDirectory.description: Path to Bulk Data Spool Directory

dcmQueryMatchUnknown.title: Query Match Unknown
dcmQueryMatchUnknown.description: Indicates if missing Attributes or zero-length Attribute values in stored entities shall considered unknown and all matching against it shall be considered a successful match; enabled if absent

dcmPersonNameComponentOrderInsensitiveMa.title: Person Name Component Order Insensitive Matching
dcmPersonNameComponentOrderInsensitiveMa.description: Indicates if name component order insensitive matching is performed on fuzzy semantic matching of person names; disabled if absent

dcmSendPendingCGet.title: Send Pending C-Get
dcmSendPendingCGet.description: Enables pending C-GET responses; disabled if absent

dcmSendPendingCMoveInterval.title: Send Pending C-Move Interval
dcmSendPendingCMoveInterval.description: Interval of pending C-MOVE responses in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS; disabled if absent

dcmWadoSupportedSRClasses.title: Wado Supported SR Classes
dcmWadoSupportedSRClasses.description: Supported SR SOP classes for WADO retrieval

dcmWadoSR2HtmlTemplateURI.title: Wado SR2 Html Template URI
dcmWadoSR2HtmlTemplateURI.description: Specifies URI for the style sheet used to render structured reports to html

dcmWadoSR2TextTemplateURI.title: Wado SR2 Text Template URI
dcmWadoSR2TextTemplateURI.description: Specifies URI for the style sheet used to render structured reports to plain text

dcmQidoMaxNumberOfResults.title: Qido Max Number Of Results
dcmQidoMaxNumberOfResults.description: Maximal number of return results by QIDO-RS Service. 0 (=unlimited) if absent

dcmFwdMppsDestination.title: Mpps Forward Destination
dcmFwdMppsDestination.description: Destination to forward MPPS N-CREATE RQ and N-SET RQ

dcmFallbackCMoveSCP.title: Fallback C-Move SCP
dcmFallbackCMoveSCP.description: AE Title of external C-MOVE SCP to forward C-MOVE RQs if the requested Entities are not managed by this archive

dcmFallbackCMoveSCPDestination.title: Fallback C-Move SCP Destination
dcmFallbackCMoveSCPDestination.description: AE Title of local C-STORE-SCP to be set as Move Destination in C-MOVE RQs forwarded to the external C-MOVE SCP specified by dcmFallbackCMoveSCP

dcmFallbackCMoveSCPLevel.title: Fallback C-Move SCP Level
dcmFallbackCMoveSCPLevel.description: Retrieve Level in C-MOVE RQs forwarded to the external C-MOVE SCP specified by dcmFallbackCMoveSCP. Enumerated values: STUDY, SERIES. Use original Retrieve Level if absent

dcmAltCMoveSCP.title: Alternative C-Move SCP
dcmAltCMoveSCP.description: AE Title of alternative C-MOVE SCP to forward C-MOVE RQs if the requested Entities are not located on a local attached Storage

dcmExportTaskPollingInterval.title: Export Task Polling Interval
dcmExportTaskPollingInterval.description: Export Task Polling Interval in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS

dcmExportTaskFetchSize.title: Export Task Fetch Size
dcmExportTaskFetchSize.description: Maximal number of Export Tasks scheduled in one transaction; 5 if absent

dcmPurgeStoragePollingInterval.title: Purge Storage Polling Interval
dcmPurgeStoragePollingInterval.description: Polling Interval for deleting objects in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS

dcmPurgeStorageFetchSize.title: Purge Storage Fetch Size
dcmPurgeStorageFetchSize.description: Maximal number of objects to delete in one task; 100 if absent

dcmDeleteStudyBatchSize.title: Delete Study Batch Size
dcmDeleteStudyBatchSize.description: number of studies to delete from the Storage System, if the usable space fall below configured Usable Space, before checking the usable space again; 10 if absent

dcmDeletePatientOnDeleteLastStudy.title: Delete Patient On Delete Last Study
dcmDeletePatientOnDeleteLastStudy.description: Specifies if a Patient shall be deleted on deletion of its last study; disabled if absent.

dcmDeleteRejectedPollingInterval.title: Delete Rejected Polling Interval
dcmDeleteRejectedPollingInterval.description: Polling Interval for deleting rejected instances from the DB in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS

dcmDeleteRejectedFetchSize.title: Delete Rejected Fetch Size
dcmDeleteRejectedFetchSize.description: Maximal number of rejected instances to delete from the DB in one task; 100 if absent

dcmMaxAccessTimeStaleness.title: Maximum Access Time Staleness
dcmMaxAccessTimeStaleness.description: Maximal staleness of recorded study accession time in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS. update of the access time disabled, if absent.

dcmAuditSpoolDirectory.title: Audit Spool Directory
dcmAuditSpoolDirectory.description: Path to Audit Service Spool Directory used to aggregate Audit Messages. Audit Message aggregation disabled, if absent.

dcmAuditPollingInterval.title: Audit Polling Interval
dcmAuditPollingInterval.description: Polling Interval for aggregating Audit Messages in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS. Audit Message aggregation disabled, if absent.

dcmAuditAggregateDuration.title: Audit Aggregate Duration
dcmAuditAggregateDuration.description: Audit Message Aggregation Duration in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS. Audit Message aggregation disabled, if absent.

hl7PatientUpdateTemplateURI.title: HL7 Patient Update Template URI
hl7PatientUpdateTemplateURI.description: Specifies URI for the style sheet used by HL7v2 Patient Update Service.

dcmUnzipVendorDataToURI.title: Unzip Vendor Data To URI
dcmUnzipVendorDataToURI.description: Specifies URI of directory into which ZIP stream in Device Vendor Data attribute will be extracted
